question: Do I need to pay any fees to be a part of this community?
answer: This community is created with the intent to eradicate the perpetual unemployability issue amongst the fresh graduates of India. Cloud Counsellage is committed to this social cause and therefore the students can be part of this community at no cost. They do not pay any fees and there are no hidden charges for being part of this community and for availing the benefits of the programs offered through this community.

question: What is Industry-Academia Community (IAC)?
answer: Industry-Academia Community (IAC) is a part of 'Industry-Academia Connect' initiative of Cloud Counsellage Pvt. Ltd. in association with Gift-A-Career Foundation created for Industry & Academia PAN India. This community engages and supports higher education students and freshers by providing them with 360-degree professional development and career growth opportunities through Career Vision, Career Guidance, Industry & Corporate Exposure, and Hands-on experience/remote internships on live projects. All the benefits of the community can be availed from any corner of the world as it is an online community and at no cost to the members.

question: Do I need to participate in all the activities?
answer: You can participate in any activities of your choice. However, each activity has its own benefit. The more activities that you participate in the more career/job-ready you become.

question: Will I get the flexibility to participate in my activities at my convenience?
answer: More than 90% of the community members have rated us 4 & 5 out of 5 for their overall experience of the activities. The reviews of the participant are available on our iReviews page and social media pages. The students have experienced a boost in confidence, especially during the interview, were able to channelize the interview, and have been placed in companies like Oracle, Microsoft, Capgemini, TCS, Wipro, Deloitte, etc. In terms of higher education, they were able to secure places in reputed universities in U.S., Australia, Ireland, etc.

question: What is a webinar?
answer: A webinar is an online seminar or presentation that allows participants to view and interact with the content and speakers in real-time. It is typically conducted via video conferencing tools.

question: How do I join for a webinar?
answer: You can join the webinar with the event link.

question: What if I am unable to join the link?
answer: In case you are unable to join the session using this link, please try to clear the cache of your browser and restart your browser then try to join again.

question: What if I can't attend the webinar live?
answer: If you can't attend the webinar live, you can often access a recording of the session after it concludes.

question: Can I ask questions during the webinar?
answer: Yes, most webinars include a Q&A session where you can submit questions to the speakers.

question: Who can I contact if I have technical issues during the webinar?
answer: If you encounter technical issues during the webinar, please post your query on the IAC community channel or the designated support channel within the IAC Platform. Alternatively, you can email us at member@industryacademiccommunity.com for assistance.

question: How long is the webinar?
answer: The duration of a webinar varies depending on the topic and format. Typically, webinars last between 30 minutes to 1.5 hours.

question: What type of jobs can you offer me?
answer: IT & Management Position

question: Do you offer remote jobs?
answer: Yes, we have remote openings.

question: Can I get a full-time job with Cloud Counsellage after my internship?
answer: Yes, there is a possibility to get a full-time opportunity with Cloud Counsellage after internship. Cloud Counsellage only hires for permanent roles from its pool of interns.

question: Are all the positions offered by Cloud Counsellage?
answer: We can also recommend you to our clients across India, UK & US.

question: Where can we submit the project?
answer: You can submit the project in the Live Project Submission form provided in the Project Submission section of the respective live project module.

question: What are the required documents for submitting the project?
answer: You may refer to the project submission deliverables list which is provided in the 'Project Submission' Section of the respective Live Project module.

question: How to ensure that the project is submitted?
answer: After submitting the project click on the 'NEXT' tab at the upper-right corner to get the submission success message.

question: Is it mandatory to watch the entire video?
answer: Yes, it is mandatory.

question: What is Industry Training?
answer: These sessions walk you through the industry's best practices and the implementation of the same, helping you to learn the corporate way of working.

question: What topics will be covered in the Industry Training course?
answer: Business Ethics and Values
Corporate Etiquettes
Business Communication
Cloud Computing
Data & Analytics
New Product Development
Github
Project Management

question: How much time is required to complete the Industry Training course?
answer: You can complete the course at your own pace.

question: Can I complete the Industry Training course after submitting the Live Project?
answer: No, we recommend completing it before.

question: Will I get the certificate for the completion of this project?
answer: Yes

question: What is the criteria for getting the certificate?
answer: You have to score a minimum of 60% in all the quizzes.

question: Is it mandatory to submit the feedback form?
answer: Yes, it is mandatory.

question: How to generate the Appointment Letter?
answer: To generate your appointment letter, please watch this video: https://youtu.be/N8IKGjxoOxEk and proceed to the Introduction section of our online Internship Program. Complete the subsequent tasks as outlined to generate your appointment letter.

question: After receiving the appointment letter, what is the next step?
answer: 1. Watch all the videos in the Internship Program.
2. Complete the steps and score at least 60% on the quizzes.
3. Generate your completion certificate.
4. Enroll in Internship Preparations & Industry Trainings and complete the tasks.
5. Dive into your Live Project through the Live Project module in the Online Internship Program.

question: How to generate the certificate?
answer: After completing the course and quizzes, you will see the Certificate tab on the bottom left corner of the Dashboard. You can click on that to generate your certificate.

question: Can we share the certificates on various social media platforms?
answer: Yes, you can share.

question: Are you going to provide us separate certificates for each session?
answer: You will get a single certificate for all the sessions in the Internship Preparation module, but you will get separate certificates for each Industrial Training session.

question: When will we get the experience letter after submitting the project?
answer: The evaluation of submissions takes around a month and the experience letter will be issued further to that. For example, if your project is submitted in June, you will be informed in July.

question: What is Internship Preparation?
answer: This module is a 5-session series to help you prepare for internships. It helps you understand the importance of an internship and how you can succeed in it. After this workshop, you will be completely ready to: 1. Draft a career vision 2. Plan your career and set goals 3. Search for an internship aligned with your career vision 4. Apply for an internship and 5. Succeed at the interview and the internship.

question: How much time is required to complete this course?
answer: You can complete the course at your own pace.

question: When is the internship going to start?
answer: You can start your internship at any time.

question: Can we do more than one internship simultaneously?
answer: We encourage focusing on one field at a time as this will help yield better results.

question: What is the successful completion of an internship?
answer: The interns have to complete the Internship Preparation, Industry Training, and Live Project, meeting the set criteria, to successfully complete the Internship.

question: When will I get the experience letter after resubmitting the project?
answer: Kindly note that 1000s of students have enrolled for the Internship Program. The re-submissions are downloaded on a weekly basis and the re-evaluation would take around a month's time, and the experience letter will be issued further to that.

question: What is Internship Preparation?
answer:
This module is a 5-session series to help you prepare for internships. It helps you to understand the importance of an internship and how you can succeed in it. After this workshop, you will be completely ready to:
1. Draft a career vision
2. Plan your career and set goals
3. Search for an internship aligned with your career vision
4. Apply for an internship and
5. Succeed at the interview and the internship.

question: How much time is required to complete this course?
answer: You can complete the course at your own pace.

question: Is it mandatory to complete this course before enrolling in the Internship Program?
answer: Yes, it is mandatory!

question: Can I complete this course after submitting the Live Project?
answer: No, we recommend completing the course before enrolling for the Live Project.

question: What is the criteria for getting the certificate?
answer: You have to score a minimum of 60% in all the quizzes.

question: What is the Online Internship Program on IAC?
answer: Maharashtra's most loved online #Internship Program (IP) is now a part of 'INDUSTRY ACADEMIA COMMUNITY' (#IAC) Membership. IAC memberships are **free** for all students who want to make their careers in IT (Technical & Management).

These free internships are only on an experience basis and are a part of our Industry Academia Community (IAC) program for a Social Cause and hence are absolutely free for college students PAN India. This noble initiative by Cloud Counsellage Pvt. Ltd. is in association with Gift-A-Career Foundation, to help students get job-ready, in time (before their graduation)!

The internship program is structured to provide students with opportunities to implement their learning on real-world problems in the field of Technology & Business. Thus helping them learn to work as per industry best practices and standards, build their confidence to deliver projects, and communicate with industry professionals.

question: How can I enroll for this Internship?
answer:
"This Internship is delivered in a structured manner to enable Interns to take one step at a time towards completing our Internship on an End-To-End online (WFH) & Flexi-Time basis. Hence it is designed as a Workflow. Though it might appear prima facie as a course, it is a construct that is required to deliver an End-To-End real-world Project Experience as per Industry Standards, to successfully complete the internship and get the Work Experience Letter/Certificate. Therefore, please go ahead and click the button ('Get course for free') >> Signup/In >> Start and 'continue' with the said workflow.

https://www.industryacademiacommunity.com/courses/Internships"

question: When is the internship going to start?
answer: You can start your internship at any time.

question: Will the internship be paid or free?
answer: Internship and other IAC activities are absolutely FREE. There is no cost involved for participating in the community activities (including internships) as this is a noble initiative taken up by Cloud Counsellage Pvt. Ltd. in association with Gift-A-Career Foundation, to help students get job-ready, in time!

question: What is the eligibility or selection criteria for participating in this internship?
answer: This internship is designed for students in higher education courses and any such student aspiring for IT and Management career can participate in this internship.

question: How many domains are available for this internship?
answer: There are 25 domains available for this internship.

question: How many IT and Management domains are available for this internship?
answer: There are 16 IT and 7 Management domains available for this internship.

question: What will be the duration of the internship?
answer: The internship duration is flexible but you have to invest a minimum of 240 hours while doing the internship.

question: What is the minimum educational qualification required to enroll in this internship?
answer: This internship program is designed for undergraduate students but if graduates and freshers feel it is beneficial for them, then they can participate in this internship program. This internship is designed for students in higher education courses and any such student aspiring for IT and Management career can participate in this internship.

question: How to choose the Domain?
answer: A form will be made available to the interns to choose the domain and the duration of the internship.

question: Will participants be able to choose/change the domain/duration of the internship?
answer: You can intern in any domain you choose. Once you choose a domain, you can continue working on the same and submit the project. After which you can choose another domain. This will help you to focus much better.

question: Is it mandatory to update the LinkedIn Profile?
answer: Yes, we recommend mentioning your intern position @ Cloud Counsellage Pvt Ltd.

question: What is the successful completion of internship?
answer: The interns have to complete the tasks as per the instructions within the deadlines.

question: What is the reason behind founding the IAC?
answer: Don't want students to go through the same ordeal that I had to go through after my graduation; waste on their precious time (working hours) in the job struggle after their graduation. IAC is an initiative to bridge the Industry-Academia Gap, to help students get Job-Ready, In Time!

question: What are the benefits of IAC?
answer:
The benefits of IAC include:
1. Industry Exposure Workshops
2. Career Vision
3. Career Guidance
4. Industry Training
5. Internship Program
6. Industry Visits
7. CV & Interview Preparations
8. Soft Skills Workshops
9. Career Assessments
10. Hackathons
11. Job Placements
12. Entrepreneurship Program
